message:
The EDU Email Events service is delayed in updating MassEmailCount cache values.

If this monitor resolves, that means the service is back working on updating MassEmailCount cache values. We should keep a close eye after the monitor resolves and ensure that the lag continues to trend downward.

Runbook: https://joinhandshake.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/DA/pages/2144404005/Runbooks+EDU+Email+Events

@slack-incidents-edu,@slack-incidents-te-talent
name: EDU Email Events RefreshMassEmailCount Lag

options.escalation_message:
Renotification: The EDU Email Events service is still delayed in updating MassEmailCount cache values.

@slack-incidents-edu
